General_Description: '''Bounty on a Spartan Leader''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description:
Kassandra noticed a bounty for the [[Sparta]]n [[Nation Leader|Leader]] on a [[message board]]:
#"[[Drachma]]e and glory to the one who kills (leader)! Let the Spartans weep and wail for their dead!"
#"(Leader) does nothing while the [[Wolf|wolves]] eat our children and the [[bandit]]s ravish us. Cut the face from his grinning skull."
#"(Leader) gained his power by robbing, murdering, and terrorizing poor people like me. I finally have enough for a bounty - avenge us."
#"(Leader) is the wolf at the door. He is the hunger in our belly and the hand at our throat. End our suffering. End him."
#"Sparta and its allies have known times of great plenty, but (leader) wastes our resources. He will impoverish us all if he's not stopped."
#"[[Peloponnesian War|War]] all of the time. (Leader) lives for it. Lusts for it. But even Spartans must have peace sometimes. We must be free of this tyrant."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra accepted the contract, and slew the Spartan Leader, claiming the bounty.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The bounty flavor texts are not bound to any single region or city.
